name: Silly Snow Symphony
description:
Have a snowballfight in a 20's/30's setting with your neighbours. Alone or Together(ask your Neighbour if you need a 2nd Player :) ).

- Made for Accessa Jam 2017 -

Theme: Accessability and "Meet your neighbours"

Music by Leon & Jannis Thein a.k.a. Jyn

Graphics & Design by Simon Barth & Julia Meuter

Programming by Sarek Lambert a.k.a Fluffi
